column4: Hello.i like Ubuntu, but i am newbie and i have some problems. My computer's RAM is almost full everytime.At example i just started my computer and 709mb are occupied from 1gb. And if i start some massive applications like netbeans(that occupy almost 300mb of RAM) then my computer slows down. What to do?
i'm using and it everytime shows me that RAM is almost full.
they are telling y9ou to lok at what application is using the most of the memory
